animeTitle: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes: Summer Special
otherNames: 探偵オペラ ミルキィホームズ サマー・スペシャル
synopsis: After some pushing by Irene and her father and a lack of support otherwise, Kokoro stubbornly quits her job as a police detective to become an idol. She soon finds the idol life draining and starts to miss her old detective life. When Henriette notices Sherlock's loneliness without her, she stages a statue theft in order to convince Kokoro to return to the force.
